name: How can I see how long each respondent has spent completing my survey?
title: How can I see how long each respondent has spent completing my survey?
body:
Overview

This article explains how to determine the time each respondent spent completing your survey.

 

Information

You can calculate the session length per respondent using the time stamps shown in the data exported.

 

FAQ

What format are the time stamps in?

The timestamps in the exported data are typically in a standard date-time format. Check your export settings for the exact format used.
